+---------+-------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| Method  | Approach                      | Advantages                                        | Limitations                                       |
+---------+-------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| mice    | Iterative MICE (Multivariate  | - Flexible for various data types                 | - May not capture complex dependencies            |
|         | Imputation by Chained         | - Handles complex relationships                   | - Requires careful specification of methods       |
|         | Equations)                    | - Multiple imputation methods                    | - Convergence criteria                            |
+---------+-------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| pan     | Pattern-Mixture Modeling      | - Focuses on patterns of missingness              | - Requires knowledge of patterns                 |
|         |                               | - Pattern-specific imputation models             | - Limited to reasonable pattern-specific models   |
+---------+-------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| mi      | EM Algorithm (Expectation-    | - Handles MCAR and MAR mechanisms                | - May be more complex to set up                  |
|         | Maximization)                 | - Joint modeling of observed and missing data    | - Computationally demanding for large datasets   |
+---------+-------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+
| amila   | Amputation and Multiple        | - Simplifies imputation process                   | - Imputation quality depends on amputation       |
|         | Imputation                    | - Works well for certain missing data mechanisms  | - May not perform well for all data types        |
+---------+-------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+
